item.title: Multiple dog fouling on public footway, 13th October
item.description:
Dog fouling at this spot has been going on for many months, a danger to young and old who live in this area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, School Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate is damaged/missing/locked problem, 13th October
item.description:
2 Kissing Gates. One on Shurdington Road, and one on Peregrin Lane, Cheltenham, Gloucestershire, are missing their barrels from their keeps. This leaves the gates wide open and risks dogs and children running out onto the road and into traffic.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 13th October
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet
